title: Post-Hearing Analysis with Rachel Maddow and MSNBC’s Team of Experts (Hearing #1, 6/9/22)
description: Rachel Maddow is joined by her MSNBC colleagues and a range of expert guests to analyze the first hearing presenting the findings of the investigation by the January 6th Committee.
author: multimedia@msnbc.com (MSNBC)
